(5 September 1926)| Regional name = | Regional cup apps = | Regional cup first = | Regional cup best = }} The '''Asturias national football team''' is the national football team for [[Asturias]]. They are not affiliated with [[FIFA]] or [[UEFA]], because it is represented internationally by the [[Spain national football team|Spanish national football team]].
